code: import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{login}from'../../services/users';import{setToken}from'../../utils/token';import'./styles.scss';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Login(){var navigate=useNavigate();var onSubmit=function onSubmit(e){e.preventDefault();var name=e.target.name.value,password=e.target.password.value;login(name,password).then(function(token){if(token){setToken(token);navigate('/');}else{window.alert('The was some problem with the login.\nPlease check the data and try again.');}});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"page-login",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"page-login-vf page-login-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:process.env.REACT_APP_LOGO,alt:"logo"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{className:"page-login-vf page-login-form",onSubmit:onSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{name:"name",className:"page-login-input",placeholder:"User",type:"text"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{name:"password",className:"page-login-input",placeholder:"Password",type:"password"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"page-login-input page-login-btn",type:"submit",children:"Login"})]})]})});}export default Login;
